alert.note: Alert for Sierra County Lakes (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sierra County through 430 PM MDT... At 359 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles east of Truth or Consequences, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Truth or Consequences, Engle, Cutter, City of Elephant Butte, Palomas, Rock House, North Monticello Point, Williamsburg, Elephant Butte Lake, Lost Canyon, Lower Palomas Canyon, Ash Canyon, Rock Canyon, Hot Springs Landing, Lakeshore Highlands, Upper Palomas Canyon, and South Monticello Campground. This includes Interstate 25 in New Mexico between mile markers 67 and 81. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
